biotools.summary: miRACLe is an individual-specific approach to improve microRNA-target prediction based on a random contact model. The strength of miRNA-mRNA interactions (MMIs) in a biological system depends on both the sequence characteristics and expression patterns of RNAs.

bioschemas.name: miRACLe
